tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_disposal_permits (
  permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  permit_date DATE,
  permit_type VARCHAR(50),
  expiration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WastePermits (
  permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255),
  permit_date DATE,
  expiry_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE WasteLocations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  permit_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE PermitHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  permit_id INT,
  change_date DATE,
  change_description VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE waste_permits (
    permit_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    permit_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiry_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE permit_holders (
    holder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id INT NOT NULL,
    holder_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_email VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE permit_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id INT NOT NULL,
    location_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE permit_inspections (
    inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    permit_id INT NOT NULL,
    inspection_date DATE NOT NULL,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    inspection_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);
